LanguageData.WNA_DimBoo.label: dim boo
LanguageData.WNA_DimBoo.description: A strange ball-like creature, created by Whelinghorther Alliance. There's many stories about the detailed origin of such thing, one stated that Alliance used animal corpses to create them. WNA - Whelingnorther Alliance
LanguageData.WNA_DimBoo.tools.tendril.label: tendril
LanguageData.WNA_DimBoo.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.WNA_DimBoo.tools.horn.label: horn
LanguageData.WNA_FerociousBoo.label: ferocious boo
LanguageData.WNA_FerociousBoo.description: A dangerous ball-like ghosty beast, it's said that Whelingnorther Alliance created this kind as bio weapons. WNA - Whelingnorther Alliance
LanguageData.WNA_FerociousBoo.tools.tendril.label: tendril
LanguageData.WNA_FerociousBoo.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.WNA_FerociousBoo.tools.horn.label: horn
LanguageData.WNA_ThornBoo.label: thorn boo
LanguageData.WNA_ThornBoo.description: A strange ball-like beast, even Whelingnorther Alliance is curious about its origion. It can throw spears to whatever it think is a threat, fast and long range. WNA - Whelingnorther Alliance
LanguageData.WNA_ThornBoo.tools.tendril.label: tendril
LanguageData.WNA_ThornBoo.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.WNA_ThornBoo.tools.horn.label: horn
